title: Chijou 10 Meters no Ori kara
original_name: 地上 10 メートルの檻から
sinopse:
A collection of Mitsukazu Mihara's newest eight one-shots from various magazines. Some are printed in two colors. The stories vary greatly in mood and tension, but are nonetheless a perfect example of the artist's distinctive style. (Source: Aerandria Scans)

1. Two Sweets ×××
2. Canary
3. a Paradox of Lion
   4-6. Natural Born Scissors
4. Rikon Shiki (Divorce Ceremony)
5. what a wonderful world
6. Tengoku to Jigoku (Heaven and Hell)
7. Chijou 10 Meter no Ori kara (From a Cage 10 Meters Above Ground)
